name: twig/twig
description: Twig, the flexible, fast, and secure template language for PHP

suggest.doctrine/orm: The Doctrine ORM integration is optional in the bundle.

suggest.ext-mongo: Allow sending log messages to a MongoDB server
suggest.mlehner/gelf-php: Allow sending log messages to a GrayLog2 server

name: jms/security-extra-bundle
description: Enhances the Symfony2 Security Component by adding several new features

name: knplabs/knp-markdown-bundle

suggest.ext-sundown: to use optional support for php-sundown extension instead of php implementation

description: Knplabs markdown bundle transforms markdown into html

name: knplabs/gaufrette

suggest.amazonwebservices/aws-sdk-for-php: to use the Amazon S3 adapter
suggest.doctrine/dbal: to use the Doctrine DBAL adapter

description: PHP5 library that provides a filesystem abstraction layer

suggest.silex/silex: for the integration with your silex application
suggest.twig/twig: for the TwigRenderer and the integration with your templates

name: knplabs/knp-menu-bundle
description: This bundle provides an integration of the KnpMenu library

description: Common additional features for Twig that do not directly belong in core

description: Provides a CKEditor integration for your Symfony2 Project.
